about_the_game:
Welcome to the Big City

You’ve just arrived in the bustling metropolis, ready to carve out your own path.  You'll need to manage your finances, energy, and time if you wish to stay!

Explore

Hop on public transit and discover the city’s diverse neighborhoods and iconic landmarks. Visit churches, gyms, libraries, and parks as you uncover hidden spots and local favorites.

Work

Earn a living within Retroronto by engaging in minigames representing urban professions. Deposit your hard-earned cash at the city’s banks to stay on top of your rent and expenses.

Connect

Interact with a range of characters as they go about their daily lives. Building relationships with the locals can open doors to new places, jobs, and unexpected opportunities.

                                                                                                                                                        

Come join Retroronto on it's development journey and help us build a community by giving us your feedback in our Discord channel!

                                                                                                                                                        

Features:

  • Open-world: Experience a vibrant, pixel-art rendition of Toronto, filled with diverse neighborhoods, iconic landmarks, and hidden gems to discover.

  • Character Customization: Character Customization: Personalize your character’s appearance with a variety of options to suit your style.

  • Pixel-art Graphics: Enjoy a charming visual aesthetic that pays homage to classic games while bringing Toronto to life through detailed pixel art.

  • Chiptune/Indie Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in an engaging soundtrack crafted from chiptune and indie influences.

  • Soundtrack: An expanding list of chiptune and indie-genre music reflecting the city's own music scene and the game's retro aesthetics.

                                                                                                                                                        

We hope we can count on your support, the best and easiest way is to wishlist our game!

short_description: Retroronto is an arcade-style city-life simulator, where you explore a thriving metropolis, engage in minigames to earn money, and meet people to unlock newer locations and jobs! Manage your finances, energy, and time in this contemporary life simulator in the big city!
